topics.body:
Hey; I thought of something: you know how 24/7 news constantly panders to the lowest common denominator to make viewers feel good about themselves in comparison?  Why not cut out the middle man?  No no no; I don't mean TMZ.  What I mean is why not make a news channel specifically featuring people getting caught in a act of hypocrisy.

Imagine a news channel that all they feature is news stories about like anti-glbt pastors getting caught in gay relationships, anti-masturbation groups getting caught publicly masturbating, politicians rallying against the ACA but using the ACA to get health care, politicians rallying against pork barrel spending but getting caught flying on first class private jets to the Bahamas on tax payer money and so forth?
